div.div:
连接请求
SYN=1, ACK=0, Seq=s1

switch.text: 连接请求 SYN=1, ACK=0, Seq=s1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 288px; height: 1px; padding-top: 90px; margin-left: 66px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
连接请求确认
SYN=1, ACK=1, Seq=s2, Ack=s1+1

switch.text: 连接请求确认 SYN=1, ACK=1, Seq=s2, Ack=s1+1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 288px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 66px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

div.div:
确认
SYN=0, ACK=1, Seq=s1+1, Ack=s2+1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 288px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 65px;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 197px; margin-left: 42px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 7px; font-family: Hiragino Sans GB; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
CLOSED：客户端处于关闭状态
LISTEN：服务端处于监听状态，等待客户端连接
SYN-SENT：表示客户端已发送 SYN 报文，等待服务端第二次握手
SYN-RCVD：表示服务端已接收 SYN 报文，当收到客户端 ACK 报文后，将进入 Established 状态
ESTABLISHED：表示连接已经建立

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
